mapper.sql: log_id, context_path, params, ip, access_time, referer, user_agent, user_id, user_name, true_name
mapper.insert: insert into t_access_log(log_id, context_path, params, ip, access_time, referer, user_agent, user_id, user_name, true_name) values (#{logId}, #{contextPath}, #{params}, #{ip}, #{accessTime}, #{referer}, #{userAgent}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{trueName})
mapper.update: update t_access_log set context_path = #{contextPath}, params = #{params}, ip = #{ip}, access_time = #{accessTime}, referer = #{referer}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, user_id = #{userId}, user_name = #{userName}, true_name = #{trueName} where log_id = #{logId}
